channel.title: [Help] How do I add full Dragon Claws to my 508 Client exactly?
channel.description:
Title speaks for itself. How do I add full Dragon Claws to my 508 client? :confused: Unless it's not released yet :|.
Dragon Claws are really awesome and my client doesn't seem to have them :|.
Thanks for the help! ;].
~ Joren.

item.title: [Help] How do I add full Dragon Claws to my 508 Client exactly?
item.dc:creator: @Zillionair1 Zillionair1
item.description:
@Zillionair1 wrote:

Either get a 525 or wait months to YEARS for it to come out.

Read full topic
item.source: [Help] How do I add full Dragon Claws to my 508 Client exactly?
